Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Considering its unparalleled capabilities, we believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this masterpiece at our suggested price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
